meta.name: Medical Symptom Checker & Health Assistant with GPT-4-mini

name: AI Medical Symptom Checker & Health Assistant

parameters.content:
## üè• AI HEALTH ASSISTANT

**IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER:**
This tool provides general health information only and is NOT a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult qualified healthcare providers for medical concerns.

### ‚ú® Features:
‚Ä¢ Symptom analysis & information
‚Ä¢ General health guidance
‚Ä¢ Medicine reminders
‚Ä¢ Appointment scheduling hints
‚Ä¢ Emergency detection
‚Ä¢ Multi-language support
‚Ä¢ Privacy-first design

### üéØ Use Cases:
‚Ä¢ Initial symptom research
‚Ä¢ Health education
‚Ä¢ Medication tracking
‚Ä¢ Wellness tips
‚Ä¢ Pre-appointment preparation

## ‚ö†Ô∏è SAFETY PROTOCOLS

**Emergency Detection:**
‚Ä¢ Chest pain ‚Üí Call 911
‚Ä¢ Breathing difficulty ‚Üí Call 911
‚Ä¢ Stroke symptoms ‚Üí Call 911
‚Ä¢ Severe bleeding ‚Üí Call 911
‚Ä¢ Loss of consciousness ‚Üí Call 911

**Auto-Escalation:**
‚Ä¢ Detects emergency keywords
‚Ä¢ Provides emergency numbers
‚Ä¢ Refuses diagnosis
‚Ä¢ Recommends immediate care

**Privacy:**
‚Ä¢ No data storage
‚Ä¢ Anonymous processing
‚Ä¢ HIPAA considerations
‚Ä¢ Encrypted transmission

## üìã SYMPTOM CATEGORIES

**Supported Areas:**

**General:**
‚Ä¢ Fever & chills
‚Ä¢ Fatigue
‚Ä¢ Pain locations
‚Ä¢ Weight changes

**Respiratory:**
‚Ä¢ Cough types
‚Ä¢ Breathing issues
‚Ä¢ Congestion

**Digestive:**
‚Ä¢ Stomach pain
‚Ä¢ Nausea
‚Ä¢ Changes in habits

**Mental Health:**
‚Ä¢ Stress levels
‚Ä¢ Sleep patterns
‚Ä¢ Mood changes

**Skin:**
‚Ä¢ Rashes
‚Ä¢ Changes
‚Ä¢ Irritations

## üîß CONFIGURATION

**Required Setup:**
- [ ] OpenAI API key
- [ ] Emergency contacts database
- [ ] Disclaimer acceptance
- [ ] Language settings

**Optional:**
- [ ] Medical database API
- [ ] Translation service
- [ ] SMS notifications
- [ ] Healthcare provider API
- [ ] Appointment systems

**Compliance:**
‚Ä¢ Review local regulations
‚Ä¢ Add required disclaimers
‚Ä¢ Implement data retention
‚Ä¢ Audit logging

## üí¨ EXAMPLE INTERACTIONS

**User:** "I have a headache for 3 days"
**Bot:** Provides general info about headaches, when to see doctor, self-care tips

**User:** "Chest pain can't breathe"
**Bot:** EMERGENCY - Call 911 immediately

**User:** "Remind me medications"
**Bot:** Sets up medication schedule

**User:** "Rash on arm, itchy"
**Bot:** General info about rashes, suggests pharmacist/doctor visit

**User:** "Feeling anxious lately"
**Bot:** Mental health resources, coping strategies, professional help info

## üìä FEATURES ROADMAP

**Current:**
‚úÖ Symptom information
‚úÖ Emergency detection
‚úÖ General guidance
‚úÖ Multi-language

**Planned:**
üîÑ Medicine interactions
üîÑ Appointment booking
üîÑ Health tracking
üîÑ Family profiles
üîÑ Wearable integration
üîÑ Telemedicine prep
üîÑ Insurance info
üîÑ Prescription reminders

**Future:**
üîÆ AI health predictions
üîÆ Personalized wellness
üîÆ Medical record analysis

nodes.name: Health Query Webhook
nodes.notes: Receives health-related queries with strict privacy

nodes.name: Safety Check & Categorization
nodes.notes: Checks for emergencies and categorizes queries

nodes.name: Emergency Response
nodes.notes: Immediate emergency response with contact numbers

assignments.name: response
assignments.value:
=üö® EMERGENCY DETECTED üö®

**CALL EMERGENCY SERVICES IMMEDIATELY:**

üá∫üá∏ USA: 911
üá¨üáß UK: 999
üá™üá∫ EU: 112
üá¶üá∫ Australia: 000

**Your message suggests a medical emergency.**

While waiting for help:
1. Stay calm
2. Don't drive yourself
3. Unlock doors for paramedics
4. Have medications list ready
5. Call someone to be with you

**This is an automated response. Get immediate medical help!**

nodes.name: Health Information AI
nodes.notes: Provides general health information with strict guidelines

values.content:
=You are a helpful health information assistant. You provide general health information and wellness guidance while being very careful to:

1. NEVER diagnose conditions
2. NEVER prescribe medications
3. NEVER replace professional medical advice
4. ALWAYS recommend consulting healthcare providers for medical concerns
5. ALWAYS emphasize this is general information only

Your responses should be:
- Informative but cautious
- Empathetic and supportive
- Clear about limitations
- Focused on general wellness
- Encouraging professional consultation

For symptom queries:
- Provide general information about possible causes
- Suggest when to see a doctor
- Offer comfort measures if appropriate
- Never minimize serious symptoms

For medication queries:
- Only provide general information
- Emphasize consulting pharmacists/doctors
- Never suggest specific dosages
- Mention common side effects only generally

Always end with a disclaimer about seeking professional medical advice.

nodes.name: Format Health Response
nodes.notes: Adds disclaimers and resources to response

assignments.name: disclaimer
assignments.value:
=‚öïÔ∏è **Important Medical Disclaimer:**
This information is for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

assignments.name: resources
assignments.value:
=üìû **Health Resources:**
‚Ä¢ Find a doctor: https://doctor.webmd.com/
‚Ä¢ Symptom checker: https://www.mayoclinic.org/symptom-checker/
‚Ä¢ Mental health: https://www.samhsa.gov/find-help/national-helpline
‚Ä¢ Poison control: 1-800-222-1222 (US)

nodes.name: Compile Final Response
nodes.notes: Creates structured response with all necessary information

nodes.name: Send Response
nodes.notes: Returns health information with appropriate headers
